thread.title: Devils' Gionta fined by league following spearing incident
thread.title_full: Devils' Gionta fined by league following spearing incident

author: Monster storm makes landfall as category 5 in Mexico
title: Devils' Gionta fined by league following spearing incident
text:
Devils' Gionta fined by league following spearing incident FOXSports 19 hrs ago © USA TODAY Sports Oct 25, 2014; Ottawa, Ontario, CAN; New Jersey Devils center Stephen Gionta (11) controls the puck in the thrid period agasint the Ottawa Senators at the Canadian Tire Centre. The New Jersey Devils defeated the Senators 3-2 in overtime. Mandatory Credit: Marc DesRosiers-USA TODAY Sports New Jersey Devils forward Stephen Gionta was fined $2,284.95 for his spear to the groin of Ottawa Senators defenseman Mark Borowiecki during Thursday's game.
AdChoices The amount of the fine is one half of Gionta's average daily salary, the maximum allowed under the Collective Bargaining Agreement.
Gionta speared Borowiecki in response to a crosscheck late in the second period of New Jersey's 5-4 victory over Ottawa . The 32-year-old Gionta received a five-minute major and a game misconduct for spearing.
Hynes on Gionta spear: "It's out of character for him and he's a stand-up guy. He the consummate teammate, the ultimate teammate."
— Tom Gulitti (@TGfireandice) October 23, 2015
Gionta recorded just 12 penalty minutes in 61 games last season.
